text: napiyin mitu niccayamaka allah mannittarul purintan. (Avvare) kastakalattil avaraip pinparriya muhajirkal mitum, ansarikal mitum (mannittarul purintan). Avarkalil oru pirivinarutaiya ullankal tatumarik kontirunta pinnarum avarkalai mannit(tu, avarkal mitu arulpurin)tan. Niccayamaka allah avarkal mitu mika irakkamum mikka karunaiyum utaiyavan avan
